SELECT count(1) FROM k_reply WHERE comment_id = #{comment_id}

SELECT c.*, d.nick_name AS b_nick_name, d.avatar_url AS b_avatar_url FROM ( SELECT a.reply_id, a.comment_id, a.toreply_id, a.reply_type, a.content, a.from_userid, a.to_userid, date_format(a.add_time, "%Y-%m-%d %T") AS add_time, b.nick_name AS a_nick_name, b.avatar_url AS a_avatar_url FROM k_reply a LEFT JOIN users b ON a.from_userid = b.openid where comment_id=#{comment_id} order by a.add_time desc ) AS c LEFT JOIN users d ON c.to_userid = d.openid

SELECT a.comment_id, a.article_id, a.content, date_format(a.add_time,"%Y-%m-%d %T") as add_time, b.openid, b.nick_name, b.avatar_url FROM k_comment a LEFT JOIN users b ON a.user_id = openid WHERE article_id = #{article_id} order by a.add_time desc
SELECT count(1) as count FROM k_comment WHERE article_id = #{article_id}
SELECT count(1) as count FROM k_comment WHERE comment_id = #{item_id}
SELECT count(1) as count FROM k_reply WHERE reply_id = #{item_id}
